controllers.ircmessagecontroller.IRCMessageController

controllers.ircmessagecontroller.IRCMessageController Class Reference

Gets passed to command and event callbacks by the dispatcher in EventController It contains convenient functions to reply to messages received All unknown method calls are delegated to the current IRCController . More...

Detailed Description

Gets passed to command and event callbacks by the dispatcher in EventController It contains convenient functions to reply to messages received All unknown method calls are delegated to the current IRCController .
